headline: BD Stock May Rise Following the Launch of FACSDiscover A8 Platform
summary: BDX unveils the BD FACSDiscover A8, a next-gen cell analyzer with spectral flow cytometry and real-time imaging, enabling deeper insights into cell function and biology.

raw.headline: BD Stock May Rise Following the Launch of FACSDiscover A8 Platform
